Package environment

Function:

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Constants
    Stores the various constant values that are used throughout the Game modules.
    Main
    Initialises game play state.
    ThreadHandler
    Handles all the threads required to run the game.

Package environment Description

Function:

This is the super module that encapsulates the behaviour for running the game.

Sub-Module(s):

  • graphics
  • logic
Author:
Joshua_Eddy
See Also:
